news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材(3374.TWO)近期營收波動與產能利用率分析：挑戰與機遇並存
news.Content: 精材(3374.TWO)近期營運表現呈現波動狀態。2025年7月營收年減14.54%，8月營收年減4.97%，顯示短期內營收成長面臨壓力。然而，9月營收年增10.26%，暗示營運可能出現轉機。公司法說會中，董事長陳家湘坦言下半年挑戰重重，營收與獲利難以超越去年同期，但同時強調將積極爭取未來機會，顯示公司對未來發展抱持審慎樂觀態度。晶圓測試新廠已於上季開始量產，預期本季產能利用率將滿載，有助毛利率改善，這是一個重要的利多因素。雖然新廠開辦費用與折舊攤提增加對上半年毛利挹注有限，但隨著產能利用率提升，毛利率有望逐步回升。車用電子方面，大陸市場需求雖略有回溫，但整體仍遜於去年，表明車用電子業務復甦進度緩慢。12吋CIS CSP雖目前占比僅個位數百分比，但新案貢獻已較去年同期翻倍，且有更多客戶新專案在驗證中，公司樂觀看待明、後年營收，這為公司長期發展提供了潛在的成長動力。此外，有新聞指出精材迎蘋果測試大單，產能利用率朝滿載靠攏，但具體細節未明，仍需追蹤後續發展。總體而言，短期內，精材面臨營收成長壓力與新廠折舊攤提的挑戰，但長期來看，晶圓測試新廠的產能提升、車用電子業務的潛在復甦以及CIS CSP業務的成長，均為公司提供了成長機會。市場情緒可能受短期營收波動影響，但若公司能有效提升產能利用率並拓展新業務，則有望提振投資者信心。

news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材(3374.TWO) Recent Revenue Fluctuations and Capacity Utilization Analysis: Challenges and Opportunities Coexist
news.Content: 精材 (3374.TWO)'s recent operating performance shows a fluctuating trend. July 2025 revenue decreased by 14.54% year-on-year, and August revenue decreased by 4.97% year-on-year, indicating that revenue growth is facing pressure in the short term. However, September revenue increased by 10.26% year-on-year, hinting at a possible turnaround in operations. During the company's investor conference, Chairman Chen Jiaxiang admitted that the second half of the year will be full of challenges, and revenue and profits will be difficult to surpass the same period last year, but at the same time emphasized that the company will actively strive for future opportunities, showing that the company is cautiously optimistic about future development. The new wafer testing (CP) plant has started mass production in the last quarter, and the capacity utilization rate is expected to be full this quarter, which will help improve the gross profit margin, which is a significant positive factor. Although the increase in new plant start-up costs and depreciation amortization has limited the contribution to gross profit in the first half of the year, the gross profit margin is expected to gradually increase as the capacity utilization rate increases. In terms of automotive electronics, demand in the mainland Chinese market has slightly rebounded, but overall it is still inferior to last year, indicating that the recovery of the automotive electronics business is slow. Although 12-inch CIS CSP currently accounts for only a single-digit percentage, the contribution of new projects has doubled compared with the same period last year, and more new customer projects are in verification. The company is optimistic about revenue in the next two years, which provides potential growth momentum for the company's long-term development. In addition, news indicates that Jingcai is welcoming large Apple testing orders, and the capacity utilization rate is approaching full load, but the specific details are unknown, and follow-up developments need to be tracked. Overall, in the short term, Jingcai faces the challenges of revenue growth pressure and new plant depreciation amortization, but in the long term, the increase in capacity of the new wafer testing plant, the potential recovery of the automotive electronics business, and the growth of the CIS CSP business all provide growth opportunities for the company. Market sentiment may be affected by short-term revenue fluctuations, but if the company can effectively increase capacity utilization and expand new businesses, it is expected to boost investor confidence.

news.Title: 精材產能滿載
news.Content:
台積電轉投資封測廠精材（3374）昨（14）日舉行法說會，董事長陳家湘指出，旗下晶圓測試（CP）新廠已於上季開始量產，預期本季產能利用率將滿載，有助毛利率改善，待晶圓測試新廠建置完畢後，整體產能為去年同期的1.6倍。

展望後市，陳家湘坦言，下半年挑戰重重，營收與獲利難以超越去年同期，公司將審慎應對，但也會積極爭取未來機會。

精材晶圓測試則是與母公司台積電合作，陳家湘指出，12吋晶圓測試新廠已在上季開始量產，帶動上半年晶圓測試營收年增47%，但礙於新廠開辦費用與折舊攤提增加，因此對上半年毛利挹注有限，預期隨著產能利用率提升，毛利率有望逐步回升。

車用電子方面，陳家湘點出，大陸市場需求略有回溫，但整體仍遜於去年。此外，12吋CIS CSP雖目前占比僅個位數百分比，但新案貢獻已較去年同期翻倍，且有更多客戶新專案在驗證中，公司樂觀看待明、後年營收。

news.Title: 【公告】精材受邀參加凱基證券舉辦之線上法說會
news.Content:
日 期：2025年08月07日
公司名稱：精材 (3374)
主 旨：精材受邀參加凱基證券舉辦之線上法說會
發言人：林恕敏
說 明：
符合條款第四條第XX款：12
事實發生日：114/08/14
1.召開法人說明會之日期：114/08/14
2.召開法人說明會之時間：14 時 30 分
3.召開法人說明會之地點：線上法說會
4.法人說明會擇要訊息：本公司受邀參加凱基證券舉辦之線上法說會，會中說明本公司經營結果及營運展望。
廣告廣告
5.其他應敘明事項：活動諮詢請洽凱基證券 鄭小姐 ; janice.cheng@kgi.com

news.Title: 精材迎蘋果測試大單 產能利用率朝滿載靠攏
